Regarding CloneDVD
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2008 Topics: (Year We Visited the Town): Regarding CloneDVD
By GM on Wednesday, March 19, 2008 - 02:23 pm:

Does CloneDVD use subcode data like CloneCD? If so, it is possible to make DVDs that regenerate special monsters in the PS2 games with them?

I am inquisitive today.

By John Hawley on Wednesday, March 19, 2008 - 03:56 pm:

No, unfortunately, it does not. Multiple attempts to find a work around have all ended poorly.

By GM on Wednesday, March 19, 2008 - 04:22 pm:

I see.

What about the latest version of CloneCD? Will it still let you get CD subcode data?

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, March 19, 2008 - 06:58 pm:

I dunno, I thought the company that made the software got in trouble over something and their website was shut down.

By GM on Wednesday, March 19, 2008 - 08:08 pm:

Apparently not. They're still doing CloneCD and CloneDVD. In fact, they even recently made CloneCD HD for HD-DVD and Blu-Ray discs.
